name: replaceListNoCase
syntax:
replaceListNoCase(string, list1, list2, includeEmptyFields)
replaceListNoCase(string, list1, list2, delimiter, includeEmptyFields)
replaceListNoCase(string, list1, list2, delimiterList1, delimiterList2, includeEmptyFields)
description: Replaces occurrences of the elements from a delimited list in a string with corresponding elements from another delimited list. The search is case-insensitive.

params.name: string
params.description: A string, or a variable that contains one, within which to replace substring

params.name: list1
params.description: List of substrings for which to search

params.name: delimiter
params.description: Common delimiter for both search and replacement.

params.name: includeEmptyFields
params.description: When true, zero-length list elements are preserved.

examples.title: Tag Example
examples.code:
<cfset myString = "My test string" />
<cfset mySubstring1 = "Test, String" />
<cfset mySubString2 = "Replaced, Sentence" />
<cfoutput>#replaceListNoCase(myString, mySubstring1, mySubString2)#</cfoutput>
